alert.note: Alert for Amite; Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 16 at 6:14PM CST until February 16 at 7:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of southern Mississippi, including the following counties, Amite, Pike and Walthall. * WHEN...Until 815 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 613 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This may cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain may result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mccomb, Magnolia, Osyka, Salem, Gillsburg and Mccomb Airport. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
